Directions: In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, mustard and cumin. In another bowl, beat eggs and buttermilk. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Fold in ham and 1-1/4 cups cheese. Fill greased muffin cups two-thirds full. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake at 375 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks. Serve warm.  Refrigerate leftovers.
